about_the_game:
Relive the most iconic moments of a rally legend with the Colin McRae: FLAT OUT Pack, featuring;

40 challenging scenarios from three decades of Colin McRae’s career.

12 new breathtaking rally routes through Perth and Kinross, Scotland.

Colin's SUBARU Impreza S4 Rally and the SUBARU Legacy RS.
detailed_description:
Relive the most iconic moments of a rally legend with the Colin McRae: FLAT OUT Pack, featuring;

40 challenging scenarios from three decades of Colin McRae’s career.

12 new breathtaking rally routes through Perth and Kinross, Scotland.

Colin's SUBARU Impreza S4 Rally and the SUBARU Legacy RS.
